API Reference
=============

Classes and functions in ziopcpy package. For tutorial on how to use the package to estimate the ZiOP(C) model, see :doc:`ziop_tutorial` and :doc:`ziopc_tutorial`.


The ziopcpy module
------------------

.. automodule:: ziopcpy
   :members:
   :member-order: bysource
